AT.name: Mario Party™: Star Rush
AT.description: Mario Party mal viel flotter: Diesmal ziehen alle gleichzeitig! Schließe dich mit Mario, Peach, Donkey Kong und vielen anderen zusammen – im neuen Teil von Mario Party, der perfekt für mobiles Spielen ausgelegt ist. Spiele mit bis zu vier Teilnehmern gleichzeitig und entdecke verschiedene Welten, indem du deinen Toad mit nie dagewesener Bewegungsfreiheit übers Spielfeld wandern lässt. Lass dir auch die Verbündeten aus dem Pilz-Königreich nicht entgehen, die sich dir unterwegs anschließen können. Auf den nächsten Zug warten war gestern, denn hier planen, ziehen und würfeln alle gleichzeitig! Tritt gegen deine Freunde an oder schließe dich mit ihnen zusammen, um auf dem Spielfeld schwierige Bosse in die Schranken zu verweisen. - Rekrutiere bekannte Charaktere wie Toadette, Rosalina und Wario, die dich im „Toad Scramble“ gegen andere Toads unterstützten. - Wähle aus verschiedenen Spielfeldern in verschiedenen Welten aus, von denen jedes einen eigenen Boss hat, den es zu besiegen gilt. - Bis zu vier Spieler können gleichzeitig würfeln und sich frei auf dem Spielfeld bewegen. - Schließe dich mit bis zu vier Figuren aus dem Pilz-Königreich zusammen und sichere dir den Sieg durch ihre Unterstützung bei verschiedenen Events. Diese Software unterstützt bis zu 4 Spieler für Lokales Spiel und Download-Spiel. Unter amiibo.nintendo.eu findest du eine Liste kompatibler amiibo™ und aktuelle Informationen. Um amiibo auf Nintendo 3DS-, Nintendo 3DS XL- und Nintendo 2DS-Systemen zu benutzen, wird ein Nintendo 3DS-NFC-Lese-/Schreibgerät benötigt.

AU.name: Mario Party™: Star Rush
AU.description: A new approach to Mario Party: quicker play and simultaneous turns! Team up with Mario, Peach, Donkey Kong, and more in the most perfectly portable Mario Party game to date. Play with up to four players simultaneously, exploring different worlds as you freely move your Toad across maps and recruit Mushroom Kingdom allies. Break free of turn order, with all players plotting strategy, rolling the dice and moving...all simultaneously! Team up with your friends in the real world to compete or co-operate to take down bosses in each game board. - Recruit characters like Toadette, Rosalina and Wario to team up with and support you in Toad Scramble starring Toads - Choose from multiple boards in different worlds, each with tricky boss battles - Up to four players can simultaneously roll and move freely around a map - Team up with up to four Mushroom Kingdom characters who can help you win by participating in different events This software supports up to 4 players for both Local Play and Download Play. Visit amiibo.nintendo.com.au for compatible amiibo™ and the latest information. To use amiibo on Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL and Nintendo 2DS systems a Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer is required.

BG.name: Mario Party™: Star Rush
BG.description: A new approach to Mario Party: quicker play and simultaneous turns! Team up with Mario, Peach, Donkey Kong, and more in the most perfectly portable Mario Party game to date. Play with up to four players simultaneously, exploring different worlds as you freely move your Toad across maps and recruit Mushroom Kingdom allies. Break free of turn order, with all players plotting strategy, rolling the dice and moving...all simultaneously! Team up with your friends in the real world to compete or co-operate to take down bosses in each game board. - Recruit characters like Toadette, Rosalina and Wario to team up with and support you in Toad Scramble starring Toads - Choose from multiple boards in different worlds, each with tricky boss battles - Up to four players can simultaneously roll and move freely around a map - Team up with up to four Mushroom Kingdom characters who can help you win by participating in different events This software supports up to 4 players for both Local Play and Download Play. Visit amiibo.nintendo.eu for compatible amiibo™ and the latest information. To use amiibo on Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL and Nintendo 2DS systems a Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer is required.

BE.name: Mario Party™ : Star Rush
BE.description: Une nouvelle approche de Mario Party : un jeu plus rapide et des tours simultanés ! Rejoignez Mario, Peach, Donkey Kong et d'autres dans le jeu Mario Party le plus portable qui soit. Jouez avec jusqu'à trois amis simultanément, explorez différents mondes en déplaçant librement vos Toad sur les cartes et recrutez des alliés du Royaume Champignon. Fini les attentes entre les tours, tous les joueurs peuvent désormais lancer les dés et se déplacer simultanément ! Associez-vous avec vos amis dans le monde réel pour vous affronter ou coopérer pour battre le boss de chaque plateau de jeu. - Recrutez des personnages tels que Toadette, Harmonie et Wario et associez-vous avec eux pour vous lancer dans Toad Scramble où les Toad sont des stars - Choisissez parmi de multiples plateaux de jeu dans différents mondes, chacun avec des combats de boss palpitants - Jusqu'à quatre joueurs peuvent se déplacer librement sur les cartes et lancer les dés simultanément - Associez-vous avec des personnages du Royaume Champignon qui pourront vous aider à gagner en participant à divers événements Ce logiciel peut accueillir jusqu'à 4 joueurs dans le mode multijoueur local et le mode téléchargement. Visitez le site amiibo.nintendo.eu pour voir la liste des amiibo™ compatibles et en savoir plus. Un lecteur/enregistreur NFC est nécessaire pour utiliser les amiibo avec les consoles Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL et Nintendo 2DS.

Break free of turn order, with all players plotting strategy, rolling the dice and moving...all simultaneously! ES.name: Mario Party™: Star Rush
ES.description: Una nueva forma de jugar a Mario Party: ¡un juego más rápido y turnos simultáneos! Forma equipo con Mario, Peach, Donkey Kong y otros personajes en el juego de Mario Party más portátil hasta la fecha. Juega con hasta cuatro jugadores simultáneamente y explora varios mundos libremente moviendo tu Toad por los mapas y reclutando aliados del Reino Champiñón. Libérate de los turnos de juego: ¡todos los jugadores lanzarán los dados y se moverán a la vez! Forma equipo con tus amigos en el mundo real y competid o cooperad para derrotar a los jefes de cada tablero. - Recluta personajes como Toadette, Estela o Wario para formar equipo con ellos y recibir su apoyo en los Toad Scrambles protagonizados por Toads. - Múltiples tableros en mundos diferentes con sus propios combates contra jefes - Hasta cuatro jugadores pueden lanzar los dados y moverse libremente por el mapa simultáneamente - Forma equipo con hasta cuatro personajes del Reino Champiñón que te ayudarán a ganar participando en varios eventos Este programa permite la participación de hasta 4 jugadores tanto en el modo de juego local como en el modo descarga. Visita amiibo.nintendo.eu para consultar la lista de amiibo™ compatibles y la información más reciente. Para poder usar amiibo en las consolas Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL y Nintendo 2DS, es necesario disponer de un lector/grabador de NFC para Nintendo 3DS.

IT.name: Mario Party™: Star Rush
IT.description: Un nuovo tipo di Mario Party: più veloce e con turni simultanei! Unisciti a Mario, Peach, Donkey Kong e molti altri nel Mario Party più portatile di sempre, in cui fino a quattro giocatori possono divertirsi insieme esplorando mondi diversi e reclutando vari personaggi del Regno dei Funghi. In questo nuovo capitolo non bisogna più aspettare il proprio turno: tutti possono tirare i dadi e spostarsi contemporaneamente! Alleati con i tuoi amici nel mondo reale per affrontare i boss di ogni tabellone, in modalità cooperativa o competitiva. - Fatti aiutare da personaggi come Toadette, Rosalinda e Wario nella modalità Toad Scramble. - Scegli fra vari tabelloni di mondi diversi, in cui devi affrontare ingegnosi scontri con i boss. - Fino a quattro giocatori possono tirare i dadi e spostarsi contemporaneamente. - Alleati con un massimo di quattro personaggi del Regno dei funghi che possono aiutarti a vincere partecipando a vari eventi. Questo software supporta fino a 4 giocatori sia per la modalità wireless, sia per la modalità download. Consulta il sito amiibo.nintendo.eu per maggiori dettagli sugli amiibo™ compatibili e informazioni aggiornate. Per usare gli amiibo con la console Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL e Nintendo 2DS è necessario un lettore/scrittore NFC per Nintendo 3DS.

Team up with your friends in the real world to compete or co-operate to take down bosses in each game board. - Recruit characters like Toadette, Rosalina and Wario to team up with and support you in Toad Scramble starring Toads - Choose from multiple boards in different worlds, each with tricky boss battles - Up to four players can simultaneously roll and move freely around a map - Team up with up to four Mushroom Kingdom characters who can help you win by participating in different events This software supports up to 4 players for both Local Play and Download Play. Visit amiibo.nintendo.eu for compatible amiibo™ and the latest information. To use amiibo on Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL and Nintendo 2DS systems a Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer is required.

NL.name: Mario Party™: Star Rush
NL.description: Een nieuw soort Mario Party met een hoger tempo en spelers die tegelijk aan de beurt zijn! Speel samen met Mario, Peach, Donkey Kong en anderen in een nieuwe Mario Party-game die de beste handheld-ervaring in de serie tot nu toe biedt. Speel tegelijk met maximaal vier spelers en verken verschillende werelden door je Toad in alle vrijheid over spelborden te verplaatsen en bondgenoten uit het Paddenstoelenrijk te zoeken. Je hoeft niet langer te wachten tot je aan de beurt bent, want alle spelers kunnen nu tegelijk dobbelstenen gooien en zich verplaatsen! Speel samen met of juist tegen je vrienden om eindbazen te verslaan op ieder spelbord. - Werk samen met personages als Toadette, Rosalina en Wario in de spelstand Toad Scramble. - Kies uit verschillende spelborden in diverse werelden, die allemaal worden bewoond door een andere eindbaas. - Maximaal vier spelers kunnen tegelijk hun dobbelstenen gooien en zich vrij over het spelbord bewegen. - Werk samen met maximaal vier bewoners van het Paddenstoelenrijk, die je kunnen helpen bij verschillende uitdagingen. Deze software ondersteunt tot maximaal 4 spelers via Local Play en Download Play. Kijk op amiibo.nintendo.eu voor compatibele amiibo™ en de meest recente informatie. Om amiibo te gebruiken op Nintendo 3DS-, Nintendo 3DS XL- en/of Nintendo 2DS-systemen is een NFC-lezer/-schrijver voor Nintendo 3DS nodig.

NZ.name: Mario Party™: Star Rush
NZ.description: A new approach to Mario Party: quicker play and simultaneous turns! Team up with Mario, Peach, Donkey Kong, and more in the most perfectly portable Mario Party game to date. Play with up to four players simultaneously, exploring different worlds as you freely move your Toad across maps and recruit Mushroom Kingdom allies. Break free of turn order, with all players plotting strategy, rolling the dice and moving...all simultaneously! Team up with your friends in the real world to compete or co-operate to take down bosses in each game board. - Recruit characters like Toadette, Rosalina and Wario to team up with and support you in Toad Scramble starring Toads - Choose from multiple boards in different worlds, each with tricky boss battles - Up to four players can simultaneously roll and move freely around a map - Team up with up to four Mushroom Kingdom characters who can help you win by participating in different events This software supports up to 4 players for both Local Play and Download Play. Visit amiibo.nintendo.com.au for compatible amiibo™ and the latest information. To use amiibo on Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL and Nintendo 2DS systems a Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer is required.

PL.name: Mario Party™: Star Rush
PL.description: A new approach to Mario Party: quicker play and simultaneous turns! Team up with Mario, Peach, Donkey Kong, and more in the most perfectly portable Mario Party game to date. Play with up to four players simultaneously, exploring different worlds as you freely move your Toad across maps and recruit Mushroom Kingdom allies. Break free of turn order, with all players plotting strategy, rolling the dice and moving...all simultaneously! Team up with your friends in the real world to compete or co-operate to take down bosses in each game board. - Recruit characters like Toadette, Rosalina and Wario to team up with and support you in Toad Scramble starring Toads - Choose from multiple boards in different worlds, each with tricky boss battles - Up to four players can simultaneously roll and move freely around a map - Team up with up to four Mushroom Kingdom characters who can help you win by participating in different events This software supports up to 4 players for both Local Play and Download Play. Visit amiibo.nintendo.eu for compatible amiibo™ and the latest information. To use amiibo on Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL and Nintendo 2DS systems a Nintendo 3DS NFC Reader/Writer is required.

PT.name: Mario Party™: Star Rush
PT.description: Um novo tipo de Mario Party: mais rápido e com turnos simultâneos! Une forças com o Mario, a Peach, o Donkey Kong e outras personagens no jogo Mario Party mais portátil de sempre. Até quatro pessoas podem jogar em simultâneo, explorando diferentes mundos à medida que movem o seu Toad ao longo de mapas e recrutam aliados do Reino Cogumelo. Neste novo título, os jogadores não têm de esperar pela sua vez - todos formulam a sua estratégia, lançam os dados e avançam...ao mesmo tempo! Forma equipa com os teus amigos da vida real em competição ou cooperação para derrotares bosses em cada tabuleiro de jogo. - Recruta personagens como a Toadette, a Rosalina e o Wario para a tua equipa e recebe o seu apoio nos Toad Scrambles protagonizados por Toads - Múltiplos tabuleiros em mundos diferentes com os seus próprios combates contra bosses - Até quatro jogadores podem lançar os dados e mover-se livremente pelo mapa em simultâneo - Forma equipa com até quatro personagens do Reino Cogumelo que te ajudarão a ganhar participando em vários eventos Esta aplicação suporta até 4 jogadores no modo de jogo local e no modo de download. Aceda a amiibo.nintendo.eu para consultar a lista de amiibo™ compatíveis e as informações mais recentes. Para usar os amiibo com as Consolas Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL e Nintendo 2DS, é necessário um leitor/gravador de NFC Nintendo 3DS.

RU.name: Mario Party™: Star Rush
RU.description: Новый подход к Mario Party: более динамичная игра и одновременные ходы! Соберитесь вместе с Марио, Пич, Донки Конгом и другими персонажами в самой портативной из вечеринок Mario Party. До четырех человек могут играть одновременно, исследуя различные миры, свободно передвигая своего тоада по карте и привлекая на свою сторону союзников из Грибного королевства. Теперь не надо ждать, пока закончится ход другого игрока... Все бросают кубики и ходят одновременно! Собирайтесь вместе с друзьями и сражайтесь с боссами на каждой карте в совместном режиме. - Привлеките на свою сторону Тоадетту, Розалину и Варио, которые будут помогать вам в режиме Toad Scramble. - Выбирайте из множества карт в различных мирах и готовьтесь к напряженным битвам с боссами. - До четырех игроков могут одновременно бросать кубики и свободно передвигаться по карте. - Соберите команду из четырех персонажей Грибного королевства, которые помогут вам победить в различных состязаниях. Данная программа поддерживает до 4 игроков в режиме локальной игры или загружаемой игры. Посетите amiibo.nintendo.eu для получения информации о совместимых amiibo™ и прочей актуальной информации. Чтобы использовать amiibo с системами Nintendo 3DS, Nintendo 3DS XL или Nintendo 2DS, необходимо устройство чтения/записи NFC для Nintendo 3DS.
